page.title: 11LIFE STYLES
page.content: {*****A TYPICAL DAY OF MY LIFE***** I AM AN 11 YEAR OLD GIRL AND I LIVE IN MANSFIELD.I GET UP AT 8am AND GET DRESSED INTO A BOTTLE GREEN SKIRT AND A WHITE BLOUSE,THIS IS MY SCHOOL UNIFORM.I DON'T HAVE ANYTHING TO EAT BEFORE SCHOOL JUST A DRINK.I THEN HAVE A 10 MINUTE WALK TO SCHOOL.SCHOOL STARTS AT 8.50am.LUNCH IS AT 11.50am.FOR LUNCH I HAVE A BREAD ROLL AND APPLE PIE.LUNCH ENDS AT 1pm. SCHOOL FINISHES AT 3.30 pm.AND I HAVE ANOTHER WALK HOME. WHEN I AM HOME I GET CHANGED INTO MY SKIN-TIGHT DENIM JEANS AND BAGGY JUMPER.AT 5.45pm.I HAVE TEA WITH MY FAMILY.TODAY,TEA WAS JUMBO FISH FINGERS,CHIPS AND BAKED BEANS.I THEN WATCHED 'TOP OF THE POPS' AND SAW WHAM.TOP OF THE POPS IS A TELEVISION PROGRAMME THAT PLAYS THE TOP POP SONGS.
